feature.label: net.refractions.udig_language-feature
feature.description: This feature packages up the lanaguage specific fragments contributing translations of the uDig online help into different lanagues. The eclipse RCP translations are also referenced at this time. Please note that lanaguage translations are included directly with each plug-in (leaving this feature out will only save bit of room based on not including the online help). You may leave this feature out of your application if you wish to restrict yourself to an English audience.
